Reviews.Title: I love this phone!
Reviews.Author: Chris Boykin
Reviews.Content: For the price; this phone is great! I think that BLU will have great success. I have the Samsung Galaxy 3 and HTC One X  quad core so I know what the best rated phones will do! The Samsung galaxy 3 has terrible battery life and weak WIfI. The One X has great WIFI; great battery and it does not like to switch sim cards. So for me this inexpensive phone is better than the best most expensive phones. It has great battery life and good everything else. The only trump is the camera options are less on the Blu. So I give the BLU Vivo best of the three considering all especially price. I paid over $600 for the Htc one X and have a 2 year contract with the S3. I also am married to an Apple lover and see side by side reality with the GOD of smart phones the Iphone 5 and I have to snicker a little under my breath. I love this phone! Krissboyk@hotmail.com

Reviews.Title: Made a great Gift!
Reviews.Author: Brenlon S.
Reviews.Content: This was my third time around buying this phone, the fist one i bought was for myself, the second was for a sister and third was for a buddy of mines. We all love them, but i prefer the D910a model over the D910i. The software runs a bit different. I'm pretty sure i will be making more buys in the future.

Reviews.Title: So-so
Reviews.Author: Brianne
Reviews.Content: Phone is great for the dual sim.  It also has screen capture and a wonderful camera/flash and works fast with wifi.  Nice screen and good vibration quality.  Lots of memory and doesn't scratch easily.  Vibrates when someone picks up to let you know.  Cons--shows you can do ringer IDs, but won't save, often hangs up when another person answers, doesn't work well with T-Mobile, headphones that come with the phone are the only ones that work--and mine were about 4 inches uneven.  Battery life is not what is advertised, it doesn't save numbers not in the contacts in the call log, it doesn't let you go online during a call.

Reviews.Title: Excellent price and cost relationship
Reviews.Author: Daniel Francelino
Reviews.Content: For the price you pay, it's really excellent. It's not a galaxy or an iphone, but I've been having a lot of fun since I got it. Could have more RAM memory though.

Reviews.Title: Excellent smartphone
Reviews.Author: Bruno Pelegrini
Reviews.Content: High end smartphone with low cost. Excellent and recomended! Bought one to my wife and gonna buy one for me!

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: happyfeetagain
Reviews.Content: I bought it for my son, he is so happy with it, I was texting the cameras, the voice recorder in phone calls, GPS. He just asked to buy a portable battery charger because he is almost all day using many apps and accounts on his phone.  Same funtions as the google nexus but cheaper

Reviews.Title: New Phone
Reviews.Author: Steven
Reviews.Content: I have only had it for a month but so far I love the phone and the feature offers it has but the price drop after I bought and it and I felt like I should  have gotten that difference back as of today April 1 2013 nothing has occurred

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Luis Henrique S. Godeghesi
Reviews.Content: I'm enjoying very much my Blu Vivo 4.3. It works very well. It's light, thin, and very easy to use. For those who need a 2 sim card phone, it's a must buy.

Reviews.Title: Great android phone
Reviews.Author: M. Abaya "great interest"
Reviews.Content: I got this phone just about one month ago. It has met all my expectations.  I like the responsiveness of the screen and the fact that everything in it works.  It is a well built phone. My only pain is the lack of accessories, but for a new phone in the market, I am not surprised.  It is a great phone for it's price.  I will buy this phone for any family member. MA.

Reviews.Title: no title
Reviews.Author: aggggggg
Reviews.Content: The phone came as advertised and within the shipping time frame. I would say phone is good for the price. It has the same functionality as most smart phones. I would recommend this phone to other consumers. The only issue I have found is I can not send or receive multimedia messages.

Reviews.Title: Worst phone ever
Reviews.Author: Gaudy Martinez
Reviews.Content: This is the worst phone I've ever had...Doesn't connect to 3G, it repeats the SMS's over and over and over and 20 times over again. It's slow and it gets frozen A LOT.Next time I'll pay more for a good brand. This has been the worst buy ever

Reviews.Title: Doesn't accept the sims I need
Reviews.Author: MS "MS"
Reviews.Content: Seems to work with a very limited selection of sims.  Truphone did not work for example.  Responsive and nice look to screen though.

Reviews.Title: Extremely good phone for the money!
Reviews.Author: calb
Reviews.Content: Exceptional value-for-money mobile, very responsive touch-screen, fast surfing! AMO-LED display is very good for colours and contrast. I am very happy with it!

Reviews.Title: RETRACTED *** READ MY UPDATE *** Great value for the price
Reviews.Author: Jack
Reviews.Content: Update April 2014 --- Very disappointed in warranty service.  After less than six months the display gradually went black.  I submitted to their RMA Group as instructed.  I was informed that they would need $107 to repair and return.  Just bought a Moto G.  I suggest you check out more reputable Motorola model.########################I've been using this for streaming music and podcasts via wi fi. So far I am very happy with it. The bluetooth works fine with my car. I'll eventually add a T Mobile SIM and update my review when I'm using as a phone.

Reviews.Title: Overall excellent that was a good choice
Reviews.Author: Alvlack
Reviews.Content: Overall excellent that was a good choice to use it with  Tmobile, Family mobile, Ptel, Redpocket wireless, and H2o wireless

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Melissa Hicks
Reviews.Content: I really enjoy my new Blu 4.3.  I've been using it about three weeks and it works great.  Since it was unlocked I've been able to shop for best cell service.  Easy to use and takes great pictures.  I haven't used dual sim function but it's nice to have in case of traveling.  Lovely display.  Because it's not a major brand it is difficult to find accessories like cases or screen covers.

Reviews.Title: excellent telephone
Reviews.Author: jhonny
Reviews.Content: Excellent product, very nice, manageable, orientated to the new technologies and demanding users, the sending to destination was punctual without any hurt, marvel of telephone ... successes

Reviews.Title: Just Excellent
Reviews.Author: Stargazer
Reviews.Content: This is great phone, The great 8gb camera, screen size easy on the eyesand small enough to tuck away in the pocket of my jeans.The dual SIM card is great, one for my work number and one for my personal number. Great !

Reviews.Title: worst phone i have ever had
Reviews.Author: N. Shane
Reviews.Content: We got the phone with great anticipation...good reviews...sleek design....Unfortunately, since day one it has been awful...The battery life is horrible - it takes forever to charge and then runs out in less then five hours...Today we have another problem...Although the phone is kept in a protective sleeve and has never fallen, all of a sudden the screen has a big black area (that is growing!!) on the side...Do not order this phone.

Reviews.Title: ok phone but skype doesn't work
Reviews.Author: hazbro
Reviews.Content: Phone has good performance. Not a fantastic battery life but acceptable. Skype not allowing voice calls even if I try different versions of skype

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I was lookin for a unlock dual sim smart phone for the prize that will not break the bank,this fits what i was looking for.I will be travelling soon so i will see how it work in a next country.

Reviews.Title: It's cool (and hot at times)!
Reviews.Author: Roy Prendas-Álvarez
Reviews.Content: This phone is really cool. It does everything the famous Samsung does....all functions work well for half the price, and without compromising quality.There is only one minor issue: around once a week it seems to overheat in the battery section, and it does turn itself off. Other than that, no issues at all. But I have always been able to turn it back on with no consequences.I recommend it. I'm waiting for the tablet.

Reviews.Title: really nice phone
Reviews.Author: Tom Hoffman
Reviews.Content: I am very glad I bought this phone. I have compared it with a number of others my friends own and this one is as good if not better in performance than all the others, most costing twice the price. It is fast, takes good pictures and makes super clear video calls. I often make overseas Skype calls and the performance is much better than my computer. It is a great phone at a great price.

Reviews.Title: Works Great in Asia with DUAL sim capability
Reviews.Author: BobBoy
Reviews.Content: one sim is 2g and the other is 3g. perfect for traveling. No automatic update. You have to email BLU to get an update. I did not like their weird icons and there's a small learning curve to their android version. But I was pleasantly surprised with the GPS and camera. I would of been lost without this phone in asia. There's probably better phones out there, but it doesn't have DUAL sim. Bought 2 sim cards from the top 2 cell phone companies and whichever had the best coverage is what i would use to connect to the internet. It's easy to swap from one sim to the other.

Reviews.Title: Great, but ...
Reviews.Author: alqasem
Reviews.Content: The wonderful and unique and powerful specification and there was no problem I have, but it does not support Arabic languageExpected that system Alandroed like Apple system where all languagesThere was a problem in copper parties to the entrance slice sim card no longer works with me, but on a single chip. Was admitted to shorten me and not the hardware: (Does not quite have enjoyed the device

Reviews.Title: Wrong item description
Reviews.Author: Jayker Henriquez
Reviews.Content: This item is described blu vivo 4.3 D910i mean 3g network suported frecuencies are 900/2100. The blu vivo 4.3 D910a the 3g network of suported frecuencies are 850/190o. Any Blu vivo 4.3 has a 3g frecuency suport for 850/2100. You need to verify and update the item description.

Reviews.Title: Blu Vivo 4.3 D910i is a good dual sim dual standby phone
Reviews.Author: mediascott
Reviews.Content: Works as advertised, dual sim and dual standby.  Intially feels light compared with other phones yet it is easy and comfortable to hold.  There are better spec'd phones out there but those are usually single Sim or CDMA.  For our purposes, we use this handset for International travel with one Sim for a US based calls and then once Sim for the in-country Sim.  Every other aspect of the phone is typical for an Android hand set.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Will Weeks
Reviews.Content: Excellent phone, have been using for a couple months now and have  had no serious issues. Do note that the ROM is actually 1 GB, the RAM is actually 512 MB, and the SD card is 4GB.

Reviews.Title: not quit satified
Reviews.Author: trudy
Reviews.Content: its okay but very disappointed battery dies quickly. I am also disappointed that am unable to purchase a  a case by itself. be careful when buying this phone.

Reviews.Title: Semi Smart Phone
Reviews.Author: Tileman in WD "MPTjr"
Reviews.Content: This is a nice looking phone.  My displeasure is that 1) it wouldn't connect to the mobile data; and 2) custom ring tones could not be set.  Each time a ring tone was selected, it would revert to the default.  Both the vendor and manufacturer simply reiterated the instructions I had already followed.  I would have rated it 2 1/2 stars, but couldn't get the 1/2 star to show.  The service from the manufacture was virtually nonexistent - I was told to go back to the vendor for any warranty items.  I returned the phone.

Reviews.Title: Blu WIll not stand by warranty in products sold on AMAZON
Reviews.Author: oxexpat_in_la
Reviews.Content: Please please the letter below regarding issues I had with a 4 month old warranted but failed BLU phoneGood Afternoon,Thank you for contacting BLU Products. It is our pleasure to serve you.It has been brought to our attention that you are having functional problems with a mobile device you purchased from one of our customers. CT Miami is a wholesale distributor and as such, the warranty policies are strictly written for phone distributors only and not end users.We appreciate your understanding and cooperation. For warranty claims of your BLU product mobile device, please contact the distributor Amazon where you made your purchase.Thank you again for contacting CT Miami RMA Department.Best regards,Service BLU ProductsAmazon says its not their responsibility but offered a 50% refund as a show of good faith...................Buyer Beware!!

Reviews.Title: defective phone
Reviews.Author: Jose Flores
Reviews.Content: The screen color are tastefully designed, everything but everything is tinged red, the camera looks horrible, I'm very upset with this phone, it was not what I wanted and I was so excited with his arrival ... I hope you solve this problem and rejoin me my money or I change the phone.

ProductInfo.Features:
Unlocked Dual Sim 4.3-Inch Super AMOLED Plus Display, 1 GHz Dual Core Processor
Android 4.1 Jelly Bean, 3G 850/2100 HSDPA 7.2 Mbps, 4GB Internal Memory, Micro SD up to 32GB
8MP Camera I 1.3MP Front, HD Video Recording 720p, Auto Focus, LED Flash, Face and Smile Detection
Built-in Social Apps: Face book, Twitter, Whatsapp, Google Search, Maps, Gmail, Youtube, Calendar, Google Talk
Supports Video Call
ProductInfo.Name: BLU Vivo 4.3 D910i Unlocked Phone with 4.3-Inch Super AMOLED Plus Display, Dual SIM 3G 850/2100, Dual Core 1GHz Processor, Android 4.1 Jelly Bean, and 8 MP Camera - US Warranty (Pink)
